about_hero.description: We are an independent platform that brings together cultural, artistic, sports, and educational events from all Syrian governorates, presented in an organized and searchable way by governorate, category, and date. Our goal is to make event discovery and attendance simple and accessible to everyone.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: We bring cultural, artistic, sports, and educational events from all Syrian governorates into one place. With easy search and filtering, every event meets the right audience quickly and clearly.
mission.p2: Clear cards with time/location and useful links.
mission.p3: Easy “Add to Calendar” and event sharing.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be the go-to guide for events in Syria—supporting culture, community initiatives, and a modern, accessible experience that connects organizers with audiences.
vision.p1: Enrich the cultural scene and increase attendance.
vision.p2: Build a community of organizers, volunteers, and fans.
